CustomField.formula: if( isblank(Diagnosis_Date__c), "Diagnosis Date Blank","")& if( isblank(text(Diagnosis__c)), "Diagnosis Blank","") & if(isblank(text( Hospital__c)),"Hospital Blank","") & IF (text(Diagnosis__c) = "Other" ,"Other Diagnosis - Please confirm family eligibility.","")
CustomField.label: Diagnosis Info Errors
